mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, TYPE, PARAMETER, PRIORITY, PARENT_MENU_ID, VIEW_LEVEL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IMB_MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID = A.ID) AS CHILD_MENU_COUNT, CREATOR, FROM IMB_MENU A WHERE NAME = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT IMB_MENU (ID, NAME, TYPE, PARAMETER, PRIORITY, PARENT_MENU_ID, VIEW_LEVEL, CREATOR) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{parameter}, #{priority}, #{parentMenuId}, #{viewLevel}, #{creator} )
